verses.name: Joshua 22:24
verses.text: And if we have not rather done it for fear of this thing, saying, In time to come your children might speak unto our children, saying, What have ye to do with the Lord God of Israel?

verses.name: Joshua 22:25
verses.text: For the Lord hath made Jordan a border between us and you, ye children of Reuben and children of Gad; ye have no part in the Lord: so shall your children make our children cease from fearing the Lord.

verses.name: Joshua 22:26
verses.text: Therefore we said, Let us now prepare to build us an altar, not for burnt offering, nor for sacrifice:
